title: Guys who is the best EPD faculty in RR Campus. I just want to refer their class notes.

comments.body: Dr Shruthi MLJ or Prof Sumanth Sakkara
Thank you but I guess non-of them are teaching EPD now.
Ohh, I was unaware of that
Look for prof. Sanketh's notes. He was a faculty in EC campus but he was awesome
Lavanya Ma'am, she isn't here anymore but her notes are available maybe on pesuacademy.
Prof. MSS and Prof SM class notes found useful.
